channel.title: Publicaciones destacadas on Alexis Rivera
channel.description: Recent content in Publicaciones destacadas on Alexis Rivera

item.title: Nonrenewable wealth
item.description: Chapter 9 in the Changing Wealth of Nations 2021 report that explores countries' nonrenewable natural wealth (oil, gas, coal and minerals).

item.title: Wealth accounting
item.description: Chapter 11 in the Changing Wealth of Nations 2021 report that discusses how wealth accounting (natural, human and physical capital) can be used to design sustainable macroeconomic and fiscal policies.

item.title: Giant oil fields
item.description: This database is part of an article published in the American Association of Petroleum Geologists Memoir 125 “Giant Fields of the Decade: 2010-2020” edited by C.

item.title: Project Title
item.description: Este artículo es parte del número 137 de la revista Brújula Ciudadana editada por el equipo de Iniciativa Ciudadana para la Promoción de la Cultura del Diálogo A.

item.title: Tree mapping
item.description: This is an article published in the Development Engineering Journal of UC Berkeley that present the results of a part of a World Bank project that aims to evaluate the effectiveness of payment for ecosystem services in the Sahel semi-arid forests.

item.title: Ecosystem Assessment
item.description: This is an article coauthored with Dr. Jen Burney and Dr.

item.description: (In Spanish) Este documento de trabajo publicado en la División de Estudios Internacionales en coautoría con el Dr.
